title: Welcome to Fuselage.
description: You're live! Nice. We've put together a little post to introduce you to Fuselage's markdown system and get you started. You can manage your content with the /posts/index.json file in your project's root folder.
author: Joshua Harms
author_description: Joshua Harms is a Shopify application consultant. He wrote the book on building rock-solid Shopify apps at https://nozzlegear.com.
